task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain) with cell-type labels in adata.obs. Using expression-only data, subset cells labeled ENDOTHELIAL. Within ENDOTHELIAL, run a two-group t-test differential expression comparing 90wk (OLD) vs 4wk (JUVENILE), requiring logFC > 0 for OLD and adjusted p ≤ 0.05. Rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj). Use gene symbols from adata.var['feature_name'] when available (otherwise from adata.var_names); convert to UPPERCASE, deduplicate, and drop Ensembl-style IDs. Return the top-k OLD-upregulated endothelial genes as markers_predicted (k=6).

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.17 (requires XDH in top-6; ~≥80% of 1 GT marker).
